description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.00m and eaves height of 2.85m) following demolition of existing extension
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

There is an alteration to the rear elevation of the main house, please provide existing and proposed elevations of the main house in full. The submitted elevation does not show complelte elevations of the main house.
